library.hint: A medium sized flightless bird that was discovered on the Island of Mauritius in the 1950s.
A large marsupial native to the Northern forest of Australia and the tropical island of Papua New Guinea.
A deer-like mammal found in Africa, Asia and parts of the Americas.
A medium sized domestic Dog breed, first bred in Japan in the 1600s.
A large docile species of lizard native to the jungles of central and south America.
